[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-mapview](./harp-mapview.md) &gt; [Tile](./harp-mapview.tile.md) &gt; [(constructor)](./harp-mapview.tile._constructor_.md)

## Tile.(constructor)

Creates a new \[\[Tile\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(dataSource: DataSource, tileKey: TileKey, offset?: number, localTangentSpace?: boolean);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  dataSource | [DataSource](./harp-mapview.datasource.md) | The \[\[DataSource\]\] that created this \[\[Tile\]\]. |
|  tileKey | [TileKey](./harp-geoutils.tilekey.md) | The unique identifier for this \[\[Tile\]\]. Currently only up to level 24 is supported, because of the use of the upper bits for the offset. |
|  offset | number | The optional offset, this is an integer which represents what multiple of 360 degrees to shift, only useful for flat projections, hence optional. |
|  localTangentSpace | boolean | Whether the tile geometry is in local tangent space or not. |
